publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2069 Chris Ballance: Broadcasting in Scotland—That the Parliament condemns the reported proposals of Ofcom to halve the amount of regional programming on ITV in favour of a greater emphasis on London-based programming and calls for the Scottish Parliament to be given responsibility for broadcasting in Scotland.

S2M-2069 Chris Ballance: Broadcasting in Scotland—That the Parliament condemns the reported proposals of Ofcom to halve the amount of regional programming on ITV in favour of a greater emphasis on London-based programming and calls for the Scottish Parliament to be given responsibility for broadcasting in Scotland.
S2M-2069 Broadcasting in Scotland (lodged on 24 November 2004) Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Patrick Harvie*, Mark Ballard*, Rob Gibson*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Robin Harper*, Shiona Baird*, Campbell Martin*
S2M-2069 Broadcasting in Scotland (lodged on 24 November 2004) Eleanor Scott*, Carolyn Leckie*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-2069 Broadcasting in Scotland (lodged on 24 November 2004) Alex Neil*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-2069 Broadcasting in Scotland (lodged on 24 November 2004) Tommy Sheridan*, Alasdair Morgan*
